title: Good Morning, Nijigaku Dormitory
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Fwaah, that was a good sleep~. Alright, time to wake everyone up♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Good morning, Lanzhu-chan. It’s time to wake up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Good morning, Emma! Lanzhu woke up when my alarm rang, got changed, and made my bed just like you told me to!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Wow! I guess you don’t need me to wake you up anymore.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Eeeh, no way! Lanzhu can’t properly wake up without your “good morning”! You have to keep coming!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Good morning, Mia-chan. It’s time to wake up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Mhmm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Mia! Wake up! Your breakfast is here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Shut uuup~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Good morning, Karin-chan. It’s time to wake up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hnngh.... Already? Fwaaah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Come on, take off your Pajamas and put on your uniform. I’ll leave your tights and handkerchief here, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thank you, Emma....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>No fair! Why do you only do that for Karin! Do that for me too tomorrow.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eeeh~, then me too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
